title: Bulgaria
summary: Since July 2000, Citi Bulgaria has been a full-service corporate and investment financial center.
tag-2: Citi has been present in Bulgaria since November 1998, when we opened a representative office.
tag-3: Since July 2000, Citi Bulgaria has been a full-service corporate and investment financial center.
